long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect the fast and easy way to the most reliable and professional document translation and interpretation services available. Lighthouse Translations offers high quality reliable professional document Translation and Interpretation services for nearly every language and culture, supporting businesses of all sizes across the world. Some of our clients include health care organizations, pharmaceutical companies, high tech firms, universities, international associations and global marketing firms.  

Through this extension you will be able to reach us instantly and we will be able to assist you with any of your document or interpretation needs in the US, the Caribbean and Latin America. Most common languages we work with are Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, Chinese and German.
